1.title: Demonic Possession: An Inside Story
1.plot: To be possessed by the spirit of a powerful goddess or a "Maata" is a common phenomenon in most parts of India. This documentary is a journey to get an in-depth view of what exactly happens during a possession.

2.title: Watching IPL With A Bookie
2.plot: My uncle introduced me to a bookie. Making money felt good. It started as a side business. Now it is my main occupation." - anonymous bookie. In the IPL season, we got in touch with a bookie who led us into the murky and money making world of illegal betting in India.

3.title: A Tryst With The Last Gun Maker of Longding
3.plot: The film explores the dying tradition of gun-making by the Wancho tribe in the remote eastern part of Arunachal Pradesh in the context of modernisation and militancy (being waged by numerous Naga underground groups). Making and using guns and gunpowder is not only legal here, but a way of life. And it is here, that the anchor will fire his first unlicensed weapon, hand made, by the last gunmaker of Longding.

4.title: The Story Of A Johnnie Walker Bottle
4.plot: You definitely would want to know this amazing story of a Johnnie Walker bottle.

5.title: Spending Time With The Last Head Hunter Of Longding
5.plot: The oldest head hunters of Longding recorded their kills by creating tattoos all over their bodies. Chase goes in the search for 'The Last Head Hunter Of Longding' - to find out more about the practice that is slowly slipping into oblivion.

6.title: Kashmir - Inside A Friday Protest - Part 1
6.plot: Chase, in its latest episode, ventures into the world of Friday protests in Kashmir, where stone pelters clash with the police resulting in a violent display. This film deals with the why, the who, the how of the growing dissent in Kashmir and tries to trace the reasons for the violence which has culminated to its tipping point post the death of Burhan Wani.

7.title: Kashmir - Inside A Friday Protest - Part 2
7.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

8.title: The Millionaire Bouncers Of India
8.plot: You may have the money, the right car and even a girlfriend, but on any given weekend, what stands between you and the club of your choice, is the slightest of a nod from a square jawed wall of muscle, also known as a bouncer. This episode explores this unique village of muscle men, their desire to become bouncers and the societal fault line they stand on every night.

9.title: Love Jihad - Judgement On The Spot
9.plot: In the badlands of Western Uttar Pradesh, lies the small town of Saharanpur. Our team travels to this communally sensitive town to meet Vijaykant Chauhan a.k.a. Junior Bhagat Singh, a self-proclaimed Love Jihad Crusader determined to fight for his cause till the end.

11.title: An Imitation Game
11.plot:

-1.title: Kashmir - Inside A Friday Protest - Part 2
-1.plot: The first part dealt with the what, the how and the where of the Friday protests in Kashmir. This goes in-depth in to the why of the dissent, where the roots lie and if it is a vicious cycle of expectation and betrayal.

imdb.plot outline: For a lot of the digital world, documentaries, boredom and slow as f**k could be synonyms, but at Chase, young filmmakers get to tell stories of their choice, in their unique style. Be it the last living headhunter of Arunachal or a Kashmiri stone pelter or a young girl searching for her big break via Mumbai's soft porn industry or even the Love Jihad crusaders of Western UP, we aim to explore the undiscovered world around us.
imdb.title: Chase
plot: For a lot of the digital world, documentaries, boredom and slow as f**k could be synonyms, but at _Chase_ (qv), young filmmakers get to tell stories of their choice, in their unique style. Be it the last living headhunter of Arunachal or a Kashmiri stone pelter or a young girl searching for her big break via Mumbai's soft porn industry or even the Love Jihad crusaders of Western UP, we aim to explore the undiscovered world around us.
